title: The Great Mystery
description: In this timeless message for the entire world, a sick young soldier is rushed into the emergency room, and is forced to say good-bye to the ones he loves. When his heart suddenly stops during a dangerous operation, the adventure begins in his mind. In the following scene, Amir and Eva encounter one another while lost in the wilderness and are tempted to set out on a symbolic quest with the fate of the world at stake.While Slone tells his inspiring life story through metaphor, he reminds us all of our most priceless, yet elusive gift: The Present.
author: Travis Slone
